item.description:
Hello all of You Made in Germans, German minded, German married, German befriended, German speakers or learners, German culture lovers of even just German Shepherd owners!! We are a fun and active group of people - if you like meeting new people, like to get-together for a beer or coke every now and then or go out for dinners or to parties or enjoy many other activities like biking around Block Island and all of that while speaking, learning or improving your German skills - then this is just the right group for you to join!!! Don't be afraid if you think your German is not good enough - we welcome people of every level and don't judge anyone!!
Year 2009 is going to be an exciting and active year! Lots of fun events coming up - I promise!!!!
- Hanna
item.name: The Providence German Language Meetup
